thread.title: Wizards F Alan Anderson has surgery on left ankle again

title: Wizards F Alan Anderson has surgery on left ankle again
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Wizards F Alan Anderson has surgery on left ankle again Wizards forward Alan Anderson had a second operation on his left ankle and no timeframe for his return has been determined. Post to Facebook Wizards F Alan Anderson has surgery on left ankle again Wizards forward Alan Anderson had a second operation on his left ankle and no timeframe for his return has been determined.   WUSA9.com: http://on.wusa9.com/1RG2PzH   Join the Conversation To   Wizards F Alan Anderson has surgery on left ankle again Associated Press 6:57 p.m. EDT October 13, 2015 Sep 28, 2015; Washington, DC, USA; Washington Wizards guard Alan Anderson (6) poses for a portrait during Wizards media day at Verizon Center. Mandatory Credit: Geoff Burke-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Geoff Burke, Geoff Burke-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
WASHINGTON (AP) - Wizards forward Alan Anderson had a second operation on his left ankle and no timeframe for his return has been determined. The team announced the latest surgery Tuesday. Anderson initially had surgery in May to remove bone spurs from his left ankle. But he still was in pain from a fragment, so that was removed in the second procedure. The Wizards said Anderson will start the rehab process immediately. He signed with Washington in July after spending last season with the Brooklyn Nets, averaging 7.4 points, 2.8 rebounds and 1.1 assists, while making 34.8 percent of his 3-point attempts.
